At first after installing the dmg and then patching trying to open the .auz file would result in the icon jumping in the doc forever.
What I did to fix this issue:
After installing the .dmg file and copying over the new "Live" file into the Contents/MacOS folder...
1) Open terminal (click on the magnifying glass in the top right and type terminal, then open that application)
2) Type: "cd .." without the quotes into the terminal and hit enter
3) Type: "pwd" without the quotes into the terminal window and hit enter. If it displays // continue to step 4. If not, repeat step 2 again until "pwd" does (you will have to retype pwd each time after you do step 2).
4) Type: "cd "Applications/Live 8.1 OS X/Live.app/Contents/MacOS"" without the outer set of quotes, but with the inner set of quotes and hit enter
5) Type "chmod 755 Live"

This tells your computer that the file you copied into the folder can be executed.
